name: MTabu - Forbidden Words
description:
MTabu is a social word game, it's also known as tabo.
One of the player has to make his other teammates guess the main word without using any of the forbidden words.
If you ever palyed with the classic board game, you'll be familiar with one.

Cards available in English, Turkish and Arabic.

Features:

- 3 languages
- Over 2000 cards for each language
- Choose teams' names
- Adjust round time
- The game may be paused while playing
- and more

- How To Play:
Play Classic:
There are teams competing in the game
Teams consist of 2 or more people.
One person from each team, in turn, has to tell the main word to his or her teammates without using five forbidden words.
For each correct prediction, the True button is pressed and 1 point is earned.
If one of the forbidden words is used during narration, the Forbidden button is pressed and 1 point is lost.
Each team has a certain number of passes. You can start telling new words by pressing the pass button on difficult words.

Draw, Guess:
There are teams competing with each other. One person from each team, in turn, has to explain the words given to him by drawing them on the screen. Speaking is strictly forbidden. For each correct prediction, the Correct button is pressed and one point is earned. Each team has a certain number of passes. You can start telling new words by pressing the pass button on difficult words.
